name: BurnThemAll
description:
Theme: Shapes

Constraints:  Must have hats (War Helmets), Colourful

Description: You are the only Nazi alive to protect Berlin from the Brits, Try to kill as much enemies as possible otherwise you will get shot. They shoot musket shaped rounds and are quite big, make sure to dodge if you can.

Controls: WASD = Movement, Mouse = Aim, Left Mouse Button = Shoot, R = Restart Game, Escape = Quit Game
